product.title: Lucky Puppy | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Lucky Puppy

Based on Disney’s wildly popular animated film 101 Dalmatians, this thrilling tale centers around the adventures of Lucky Puppy and his dad as they embark on a mission to recover the queen’s stolen jewels. Named for his horseshoe-patterned spots, Lucky will delight readers with his fun-loving attitude, rambunctious personality, and dogged attempts to restore order.

Tie-in Activity: Embrace your child’s artistic side by helping her create and decorate her own Dalmatian on white poster board or foam. Use a stencil to trace the dog's outline and help her cut it out, and then decorate it with unique spot patterns like rainbows, stars, or flowers.
